url.title: 1 TCP/IP Stack Libraries Help

url.title: 1.1 TCP/IP Stack Library Overview

url.title: 1.1.1 Introduction
url.description: The MPLAB Harmony TCP/IP Stack provides a foundation for embedded network applications by handling most of the interaction required between the physical network port and the application. It includes ...

url.title: 1.1.2 Key Features
url.description: The key features of the MPLAB® Harmony TCP/IP Stack are:Multiple interfaces - Ethernet and/or Wi-Fi interfaces are supported.Dual stack with IPv4 and/or IPv6 support:UDP and TCP sockets can support ...
